INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ( ${TINYTHREADPP_DIR}/source )

SET( TINYTHREADPP_SOURCE_DIR ${TINYTHREADPP_DIR}/source )
SET( TINYTHREADPP_SOURCES
    ${TINYTHREADPP_SOURCE_DIR}/fast_mutex.h
    ${TINYTHREADPP_SOURCE_DIR}/tinythread.h
    ${TINYTHREADPP_SOURCE_DIR}/tinythread.cpp )

ENDIF()
